content-type.name: widget_seo
content-type.ui:label: SEO Widget
content-type.ui:description: This widget can be used for adding SEO related information to the section or article page. Currently, this widget adds two meta tags to the head tag of the page i.e. meata(keywords) and meta(description). This widget contains two text fields for these tags. You can add static text and bean properties in the format e.g. Our site now have [section.name] section for entertainment, or [article.title] and [article.fields.leadtext.value] is a long summary of today's match. Everything inside the square brackets [] is considered a bean property. Please remember that bean property must return a string value.

field.name: maxCharactersDefault
field.ui:label: Maximum Characters
field.ui:description: Maximum number of characters of the lead text that will be displayed. The widget will cut off the text around the character limit, cutting off at the first space that can be found after the max character. The widget will not cut off words. If the lead text is shortened an ellipsis will be shown, putting three dots behind the text (...). If no maxCharacter is defined, the complete lead will be displayed (default setting)

field.name: headingSizeDefault
field.ui:label: Heading size
field.ui:description: Size of the header to be used to display the article title. This is measured from 1-6, matching the HTML elements h1 to h6.

field.name: readMoreDefault
field.ui:label: Read more text
field.ui:description: Setting this view option will display the provided string at the end of the lead, linking to the article page. Typically this is used to render a link like "Read more...". If none is provided, no such link will be displayed
